{{champion:103}} is an early/midgame champ, her scaling is pretty low compared to a lot of the midlane roster.

She's much more about joining her jungler in scuttle/drag/rift herald fights w/ a well timed charm/roaming bot/toplane and snowballing the team.
does she really has that bad of scaling?

Electrocute Ahri has a really strong 1-2 item spike, and falls off fairly hard in the late-game.

Glacial Ahri has a sooner, but weaker 1-2 item spike. She's stronger in the late-game, but not even close to comparable to an Ori or Cassio.

She is a mix between a mage and assassin , but she isn't both
She has a good mid game with 1 or 2 power spike item , and mostly you pick Ahri just for the scuttle fights and roaming bot lane 
While I do believe Leblanc is better than her at all game stages , but somehow I love playing Ahri in late game 
Even though even champions like Lux can out scale her in late game , but like any assassin in late game , Ahri is good at solo killing her targets when landing charm
Ahri's goal is to end the game before it reaches late game so no.
